title: You're a Jellyfish!
description: Have you ever wondered what it would feel like to float weightless through the ocean? Or what it might be like to have no bones in your body? You will know after you read You're a Jellyfish! Through easy-to-understand text and detailed photographs, you might even feel as though you really are a jellyfish!
highFrequencyWords: bask, budding, cloned, frilly, invertebrates, marine, medusas, planula, polyp, social, tentacles
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Diphthong : Identify the vowel diphthong ou
awareness: Commas                : Recognize and use commas in a series
phonics: Syllable Patterns                : Identify and understand syllable patterns
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
